summary: SweetSteps app: Internet Identity (II)-first signup/login flow has an issue where the first successful authentication isn’t detected by the signup page, causing a false “Waiting for authentication / popup blocked” error and requiring a Retry (effectively calling II twice) before routing to onboarding.
architectural_notes: Ensure the signup/login UI listens for and handles the initial II authentication completion (callback/message/state change) and transitions immediately to post-login routing without requiring Retry.
Add guards to prevent triggering multiple concurrent/duplicate II auth attempts from the signup flow (e.g., idempotent auth state + disable retry until timeout).
known_issues: After first successful II signup redirect back to SweetSteps, the UI still shows 'Waiting for authentication' / popup blocked error; pressing Retry then proceeds to onboarding (II effectively called twice).

existing_features.title: Fix the Signup Internet Identity flow so that after a successful Internet Identity authentication (including the case where the user returns already authenticated), the Signup page immediately proceeds to post-auth handling and routes to /onboarding without showing the “Waiting for authentication…” / popup-blocked error and without requiring the user to press Retry.

Update the Signup page’s attempt-state/guards so that successful authentication is detected even if the component remounts or local state/refs reset (e.g., after returning from Internet Identity). Use the existing sessionStorage user-initiated-auth marker (sweetsteps_user_initiated_auth) and the presence of a valid iiIdentity to resume the flow and complete validation/navigation.

Adjust the Retry behavior on the Signup page so that it does not unnecessarily trigger a second Internet Identity login when the user is already authenticated; instead, it should recover by completing the post-auth flow (validation + navigation) using the existing authenticated identity.

Keep the Login page behavior consistent with the fixed Signup semantics for the “already authenticated” and “return-from-II/remount” scenarios, so Login also does not get stuck in “Waiting for authentication…” or require Retry when an authenticated identity is already available.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix double Internet Identity call / signup page not detecting first successful auth callback (false waiting/popup-blocked error; Retry then routes to onboarding).
